event: Hu Jintao was born on 21 December 1942 in Tai County, Jiangsu province, which was under Japanese occupation at the time.
Name: Hu Jintao

event: In 1973, Hu Jintao was transferred to the Construction Department of Gansu as a secretary.
Name: Hu Jintao

event: In 1982, Hu Jintao was promoted to the position of Communist Youth League Gansu Branch secretary and was appointed as the director of the All-China Youth Federation.
Name: Hu Jintao

event: Hu Jintao was purged by Deng Xiaoping in 1987 due to Hu Jintao's 'liberal' tendencies, and Hu Jintao's departure from the political scene was initially seen as unfavourable towards Hu Jintao.
Name: Hu Jintao

event: Hu Jintao was named the 2010 World's Most Powerful Person by Forbes.
Name: Hu Jintao

event: Hu Jintao was listed four times (2008, 2007, 2005 and 2004) on the Time 100 annual list of most influential people.
Name: Hu Jintao
